entry.title: If You Want to Kill Somebody, Conquer His Heart ... Then Leave Them Between Death and Madness
entry.summary:
Author: StilesIsMySpiritAnimal_48

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,479Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 4

Summary: Derek Hale used to think pain came in sharp bursts — claws, fire, gunshots, loss compressed into a single unbearable moment. He never knew pain could be an echo. Repeating. Endless. Soft enough that no one else could hear it, loud enough to drown him. And the worst part was that it hadn’t always been like this. It used to be good. Better than good. It used to be Stiles.

entry.title: You’re Safe, I’m Here
entry.summary:
Author: Joy_peace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,860Chapters: 16/22Kudos: 25

Summary: The Beacon Hills Preserve had always been quiet in the early evenings, the kind of quiet that hummed in the bones of anyone supernatural. Most people would call it peaceful. Liam Dunbar called it suspicious. He walked a few steps ahead, his eyes flicking between the trees, inhaling like he expected to catch a threat in the damp leaves or the wind. His shoulders were coiled tight—too tight for a patrol that was supposed to be routine. The sun hovered low enough to stain the whole forest with orange and copper. Behind him, Theo Raeken let out a slow, theatrical sigh. “Dunbar,” he said, voice low but full of a patience he very smugly claimed he didn’t have, “you’re clenching your jaw so hard I can hear your molars trying to fuse.”

Summary: Back when Theo and Liam was in a relationship. Liam wanted nothing but to start a family with Theo, however over a misunderstanding it led towards their break up. So Liam decided to adopt a baby girl named Lila, unknown to him Theo also went to the same adoption center and adopted Lila's twin brother Leonardo.8 years have passed now, the twins are both 18 years old now. And they do keep in contact with one another but never knew the truth about their fathers dating, so they come up with a plan: The Adopted Twin Trap. entry.title: (If) This Is Killing Me
entry.summary:
Author: k_beta_cygni

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,408Chapters: 22/22Kudos: 89

Summary: FROM THE UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF ANOMALY INVESTIGATION EXPEDITION 13, led by USDAI psychologist Lydia Martin and consisting of cellular biologist Mieczysław “Stiles” Stilinski, EMT Scott McCall, ex-Marine Jackson Whittemore, and physicist Kira Yukimura, has entered “The Preserve,” previously known as Cedar Hearth National Park on the pacific coast of the United States. The national park had been evacuated after being overtaken by an anomalous and inhuman force. They are in search of answers for what happened to EXPEDITION 12, a team of Green Berets led by Stilinski’s husband Derek Hale. Hale had returned unexpectedly, showing up in their house with no memory of how he left The Preserve. His subordinates Isaac Lahey, Vernon Boyd, and Erica Reyes have been declared missing by the USDAI.

entry.title: Dying In Love
entry.summary:
Author: amatorial

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,031Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 13

Summary: After dropping out of his FBI internship, Stiles returned to Beacon Hills, struggling to outgrow the version of himself high school forced him to become. He wasn't sure what he was doing with his life, but he kept busy among the shelves at The Reading Nook, letting the quiet and routine distract him from the memories. And then Derek Hale walked in. Derek being in his life again stirred a hunger inside Stiles, a wanting that consumed him whole. It left him breathless, filled with a love so fierce it clawed at his chest and threatened to tear him apart inside. —Weekly Updates—

entry.title: The Loquacious Fingers
entry.summary:
Author: brsfic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,252Chapters: 7/11Kudos: 134

Summary: Derek Hale didn’t expect getting lost in his own neighborhood to change anything—until the night he frightened a stranger in a dark alley without meaning to. Stiles Stilinski is deaf, skittish, stubborn, all sharp eyes and quiet panic, a notebook clutched to his chest, and a silence Derek doesn’t understand until much later. Soon Stiles is stepping into Derek’s messy loft, borrowing his books, drinking his tea, and filling Derek’s quiet spaces with the warm, steady presence Derek didn’t know he needed. Things begin to get tricky when Derek realizes that his erotic stories more and more star Stiles instead of the usual sexy female heroine. But everything's under control until one day, Stiles is curled on Derek’s couch reading the manuscript he never intended anyone to see. Derek isn’t sure what terrifies him more: getting lost in the dark with no one to help him or Stiles recognizing the pieces of himself hidden in the pages.

entry.title: The Part That Survives
entry.summary:
Author: Joy_peace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,947Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 25

Summary: Years after the events of Season 6B, Beacon Hills has grown quieter. The monsters sleep, the pack has built lives, and Liam Dunbar has learned how to breathe again after losing the person he loved most. But grief is strange in Beacon Hills. It doesn’t fade. It rearranges itself into something sharp, something hungry, something that whispers: What if? Five months after Theo Raeken’s death, strange storms begin forming in the woods. Lights flicker. Trees crack with electricity. Liam dreams of Theo like he’s standing right beside him—until the line between dream and reality blurs violently.
